query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS automated_campaigns (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  campaign_type ENUM('welcome_series', 'follow_up', 'nurture', 're_engagement', 'custom') NOT NULL,
  trigger_type ENUM('status_change', 'time_based', 'event_based', 'manual') NOT NULL,
  trigger_conditions TEXT,
  is_active INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  priority INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  total_triggered INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  total_completed INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  average_engagement INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  created_by INT NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  campaign_type ENUM('welcome_series', 'follow_up', 'nurture', 're_engagement', 'custom') NOT NULL,
  trigger_type ENUM('status_change', 'time_based', 'event_based', 'manual') NOT NULL,
  trigger_conditions TEXT,
  is_active INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  priority INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  total_triggered INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  total_completed INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  average_engagement INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  created_by INT NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
